remarks: A Dirichlet character takes values on the unit circle.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchrabs.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrabs.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrabs.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrabs.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrabs.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) $.
dchrabs.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. U ) $.
dchrabs $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( X ` A ) ) = 1 ) $.
